scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma. Got a sec?
Sure. What’s up?
Aoi had a secret request.
Is it serious?

I wouldn’t call it “serious,” but...
Well, it’s important to her anyway.

The more Aoi thinks about it, the more she
wants to help.

She’s kind and serious and she really wants
everyone to be safe.

That’s why she can let her imagination get
the best of her sometimes.

When that happens, can you help her snap out
of it?
Me?
Yes. She trusts you. That’s why I asked you.

For when I’m of no use to her or too far
away.
She wants you to help her. Please.
Labramon...

(Labramon trusts me enough to ask me to look
after Aoi?)
(That’s a big ask. How do I respond?)
(What should I say to Labramon?)
Anything for Aoi.
I’ll do my best.
It’s up to Aoi.
Anything for Aoi.
Okay, Labramon. Anything for Aoi.

We all want her to be safe. She’s so kind and
serious. I respect her too.

If I can help her in any way, I’ll do all
I can.

Thank you. Aoi will surely be happy to hear
that.
I’ll do my best.

I still don’t know why she trusts me the way
she does...

But if I can help her, I will.
I’ll do whatever I can.
Thank you, Takuma.
It’s up to Aoi.
It’ll depend on how Aoi feels.
What do you mean?

I’m guessing Aoi would prefer it were you who
protected her.
You two get along so well, right?

And yet she trusts you in ways I could never
hope to match.
Really?
Yes. Otherwise why would I ask this?

Whenever you see the truth of this is fine.
Help Aoi when that time comes.

Okay, Labramon.
If I’m really good enough for Aoi...
Here. Take this.

It’s not a thank you present. I just hope it
comes in handy.
Please keep an eye on Aoi.

You have the power to make her feel better.
She counts on you.

Hang on, Takuma.
I found something you could use.
Thanks, Falcomon.

And, while Minoru is not here, could I speak
to you?

Hang on! Are things still bad between you and
Minoru?
It’s not that. I trust him completely now.

But as I noticed before, Minoru has
a weakness.

Even when frightened, he will try to fool
everyone until he explodes.

He pretends everything is okay but this is
hard for him.

I’ll keep an eye out to make sure he doesn’t
lose it, but I can’t do that alone.
Minoru trusts you very deeply.
You... You really think so?
I can see it. Minoru relies on you.

That’s why I want you to keep an eye out too.
He trusts you. You can do that.
(Minoru trusts me? Really?)
(Would I be able to keep Minoru strong?)
(What should I tell Falcomon?)
I need his help.
Minoru will be fine.
Got it.
I need his help.

I understand what you said but I also want to
count on Minoru.

I can see that.
It would be unfair otherwise.
I’ll tell Minoru that.

Of course, I’m not sure how much help he’d
need from you, or accept even, but...

It’s fine. Minoru’s cool. He pays attention
to what we all are thinking, is all.
Minoru will be fine.
Okay, but I’m counting on Minoru too.

I’ll help him out, but there’ll probably be
times when we need to help each other.
Sounds right to me.

Minoru can be stubborn, but he’s not the type
to be mean to someone he trusts.

With a little more maturity, I’m sure he’ll
be a fine human. Just like you, Takuma.

He will support you in turn, as well.
I believe that.
Got it.
Okay, yeah.

Minoru’s a goofball but he’s a good guy.
I want to help him.
Thank you.

You are incredible.
You can help any one who needs it.
I can see why Minoru trusts you as he does.

That’s all I came here to say.
I’ll leave it to you, Takuma.

I’m glad there’s a human like you so close to
Minoru.
Kewkewww!
Kunemon? What’s wrong?!
Kew! Kew-kew!

Oh, sorry, Kunemon. I can’t understand you.
Let me get Ryo!
Kewkew! Kewkewww!

Is that bad? Did you want to tell me
something? For my ears only?
Kew!

(That must be it, I think.
But what does it want to tell me?)
Kewkew, kew, kewkewww!

(I don’t know what it’s saying, but it seems
to be worried about Ryo.)

(I’ll do what I can but...
how should I respond?)
(How should I respond to Kunemon?)
Leave it to me!
Don’t worry about Ryo.
Kew!
Leave it to me!

Are you worried about Ryo?
I’ve got this.

And it’s not just me. We’re all gonna help
each other. Ryo will help out, too.
Kewww!

(Was that a happy noise?
I’m guessing so.)
Don’t worry about Ryo.

Don’t worry about Ryo.
Ryo has you, too, right?
Kew?!

Of course I’ll be there for Ryo too, but
you’ll always be Ryo’s best ally.
Kewkew!

(It’s getting all twisty? Is it happy?
What’s going on...)
Kew!
Kew!
Kew?!
Kew kew kew, kew!
Kewkewww!!

(And now it’s jumping?
Does this mean it’s happy?)

(I was trying to tell it to leave Ryo to me.
I wonder if the message got through...)
Kewkewww!
Wait! You’re giving me this? Thanks!
Kewee, kewee!

(It’s wagging its tail... Am I supposed to
shake it?)

(Are we done then?
What was that all about?)
Kewee, kewee!

Can I ask you something, Takuma?
How do you feel about Saki?
Huh? What makes you ask that?

It’s nothing weird. I’m just curious if you
think she’s okay.

She does things her own way, and puts on
a show of being happy, but it’s hard to tell.
She’s just a normal kid, though.

She’s excited when she’s happy, and gets down
when she’s sad.

She has her share of worries, but if she
tries to work it out alone, she struggles.

She tries real hard to look like she’s okay,
but I wanted you to know how she feels.
I see what you mean, but why me?
You haven’t noticed? She trusts you.
Really?
It seems strange that you haven’t noticed.
You’ve always been close to her.
That’s why I want you to keep her in mind.

(I’ve been close to Saki?
That’s good, I guess, but...)

(Saki’s kinda moody, though.
Would I be able to get closer?)
(What should I say to Floramon?)
I’ll just do my best!
I’ll keep at it.
I’ll look out for her.
I’ll just do my best!
I don’t know, but I’ll do my best!
That’s very vague of you.

I have no idea what I’ve been doing up until
now, so...
But I’m glad Saki trusts me.

I’ll do whatever I can.
Is that okay?

I guess that’s all you can do.
I’ll take that answer.
I’ll keep at it.
Okay. I’ll just keep on doing the same stuff.

But you came to me just to ask me to keep it
up?

’Cause whatever I’ve been doing seems to have
been enough for Saki to trust me.

And it’s better to be natural about it than
to get all weird on her.
I guess?

But you’re probably right.
Do whatever you feel is best.

I think you instinctively understand her
anyway.
I’ll look out for her.
Okay. I’ll keep an eye on Saki.

If she seems sad, I’ll just make sure to stay
by her side.

I knew I could count on you.
Thank you for keeping an eye on her.

I don’t mean to make a big deal about it or
anything, but please take this.
I’ll leave Saki to you.
Keep Saki in mind.
Oh, Takuma?
Lopmon? What’s wrong?
There’s something I need to ask you, Takuma.
Ask me? What is it?
Um... It’s about Shuuji.
He seems much happier lately.
I think you’re right.
I like Shuuji this way too.

But I wonder if he’s trying too hard...
He has a one-track mind sometimes.

One-track mind? Oh, right. He’s so serious,
he stops seeing everything else.

That’s when I think you could help Shuuji the
most!
Who, me?!
Yes! I’m sure you can help Shuuji!

(If that’s the case, then maybe I should help
Shuuji out.)

(And if he gets a little crazy like Ryo that
one time, I might need to slap him a little.)

(But Shuuji is so stubborn. Maybe all I need
to do is listen to his complaints.)
(How should I respond to Lopmon?)
I’ll talk to him.
He may need smacking.
We need each other.
I’ll talk to him.
Okay, then. I’ll talk to Shuuji.

If he just wants to vent at me, that should
still calm him down.
You’re right! Please, Takuma!
I’ll smack him.

I’ve got this. If he gets a little crazy,
I can just smack him around a little.

Hang on. You won’t really hurt him though,
right?

Anyway, thank you for taking care of him,
Takuma.
We need each other.

Of course I’ll help Shuuji, but I hope he’ll
help me out too.
Huh?

We’re friends. There has to be some give and
take.

You’re right! I know Shuuji will like that
idea! Please, Takuma!
Anyway, here. Take this.
What? Really?
Just a little thank you for hearing me out.
I’ll do my best for Shuuji, too!
Take care of Shuuji, Takuma!
Hey, got a second?
Dracmon? Sure. What’s up?

It’s not a big deal, but I wanted to ask you
to keep an eye on Kaito.
On Kaito?

You know that my fated child is unusually
unruly.

When something’s on his mind, he never asks
for help. He just cracks.

He’s a real pain in the ass, but he’s not
a bad kid.
I know what you mean.

But I think you and that pain in the ass seem
to get along pretty well.
Really?

Yeah. Which is why if anything happened to
me, and I was separated from Kaito...

Don’t say that. We’re going to finish this
thing together, safely.

Just listen to me. You’re my insurance.
My plan B, just in case.

(Dracmon’s pretty serious about this, but
I don’t want to think about bad scenarios.

(But I should put his mind at ease. Maybe
I should tell him how I feel?)
(How should I respond to Dracmon?)
Leave it to me!
Don’t be negative.
It has to be you.
Leave it to me.
Got it. Leave it to me.

But only if something happens. I need you to
look after Kaito until then.

Of course. I don’t plan on dying any time
soon.
Don’t be negative.

Let’s not talk about this.
I don’t want to hear anything negative.

You’re not getting out of this.
You’ve already heard me out.

Kaito trusts you, and you won’t forget what
I’ve asked of you.

You’re right. I couldn’t forget it if
I tried.

If things go horribly wrong for me, I need
you to remember what we talked about here.

You will need to help Kaito.
You’re a helpful person, after all.
It has to be you.

I know what you want to say, but it has to be
you, Dracmon.

Kaito trusts you on a totally different level
than he trusts me.
Maybe. But if I can no longer help him...

There might come a time when you will have to
be there for him in spite of any differences.
Uh...

I’m sorry for talking so much.
Here. Take this.

I swear this isn’t some kind of bribe.
Please, Takuma.
Dracmon...

He’s a real pain in the ass, but he’s not
a bad kid. I leave my fated child to you.

Take this, Takuma.
Can you hear me out?

What? Sure, but you don’t need to give me
anything just to ask a favor.

Just be quiet and take it. I can’t just blurt
this out without you taking this first.
It sounds really important.
Maybe not that...important.

But I do want you to continue keeping an eye
on Miu, like you always do.
What do you mean by that?
It’s just...very important to me.
Miu always seems on edge around you.

You’re older, so that’s natural.
But Miu doesn’t hate you.
This is getting a little complicated.
What?

You always find ways to get along with Miu,
right?

Miu really counts on you, whether you know it
or not.

(Miu really trusts me that much?
I would never have guessed...)

(But I should just continue to get along with
her?)
(What should I tell Syakomon?)
Of course. That’s nice.
You can count on me!
That sounds rough.
Of course.
Of course. I’m happy Miu trusts me.
Thank you. Miu will be pleased.
You can count on me.

If she trusts me that much, then I’ll take
the responsibility.

I’m glad to hear that, but...that seems too
serious.

But that’s fine. It might be better for you
to take this seriously.
That sounds rough.

I’ll do what I can, but that sounds really
hard.
Hard? How so?

If we start getting on better, then I’m
pretty sure Kaito will start up with me.

Ahaha, I can see that.
But wouldn’t that be fun?

The battle is about to begin, and the
outcome’s uncertain...

Please be sure and help Miu if I no longer
can.
Syakomon...
That’s all I ask. I leave it to you!

Miu trusts you, Takuma.
That’s why I ask you to help her.
